name: Salvos (datadelft, Falien)
description:
This is Salvos, a game we made for the Ludum Dare 50 challenge with the theme "Delay the inevitable", celebrating 20 years of LudumDare. 

You are a castaway on an island. Eventually you won't survive but at least you can try to ... "delay the inevitable!" . The game is called Salvos which is latin for Survivor. For how long will YOU be a survivor? Play our game and find out! 

Walk around to find the tools you need and learn from the land to live from the land. Good luck, Salvos!

You can play the game here in the browser, or download the stand alone client below. The WebPlayer can be a little bit wonky, and introduces some additional bugs. Use the download for the better experience. A small donation if you liked the game is appreciated. 

with kinds regards, Magus and Falien

LudumDare 49 voting and comments for Reacto (opens in new tab)
